_header: I have now set my heart so high
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of
_description: A song of love to the Virgin Mary — two 12-line stanzas (ababababbcbc)

CamTCC652.First Lines:
I haue nowe sett myn herte so hyemy luff alone is on oon
                    lente…
CamTCC652.Last Lines:
…thy fortune was so felicitudeto luff wyth owtyn
                    varyaunce
CamTCC652.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 74.
